title: 3rd Age ranger kit

properties.name: description
properties.value: 3rd age ranger kit is a set of 3rd age equipment, and is the third most powerful non-degradable Ranged armour in-game. All 3rd age range equipment requires level 65 Ranged to use with the armour also requiring level 45 Defence to wear. Players can obtain 3rd age range equipment through the completion of hard, elite, and master tier Treasure Trails.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Third-age ranger armour

3rd age ranger kit is a set of 3rd age equipment, and is the third most powerful non-degradable Ranged armour in-game. All 3rd age range equipment requires level 65 Ranged to use with the armour also requiring level 45 Defence to wear. Players can obtain 3rd age range equipment through the completion of hard, elite, and master tier Treasure Trails.

3rd age range armour has similar bonuses to black dragonhide armour except with higher magic defence bonuses. It has lower overall bonuses compared to those of Karil's equipment and Armadyl armour, whilst also being outdamaged by Elite Void Knight equipment.
